name: Block Puzzle Woody Cube 3D
description:
Get the incredibly addicting puzzle game that everyone is talking about.
From the creator of Woody ™ Block Puzzle, comes a new cube block 3D that breaks all the rules! 

Starts off easy but gets challenging fast. Can you beat the game?

The inventive puzzle game Woody ™ Cube 3D tests more than your wits. It pushes the boundaries of what classic block puzzle games can be - and how you engage with them.

- Escape from boredom and stimulate your mind 
- Fill 8x8 grid board with a variety of block shapes (L, Z, T...) in full 3D effect
- Try to get the highest score you can!

Be the best block puzzle player. 
Gain ranks, show your skill, stay on top of the list!
The journey is bound to be mind-blowing.

Contact support@athena.studio if you need help!
Follow us to get news and updates:
fb.com/woodypuzzle

Have fun playing Woody ™ Cube 3D!
